import json
from datetime import datetime
from pathlib import Path

# Capture build provenance

                           capture_output=True, text=True, timeout=5)
    git_commit = commit.stdout.strip() if commit.returncode == 0 else "no-git"
except:
    git_commit = "no-git"

build_meta = {
    'git_commit': git_commit,
    'build_date': datetime.now().isoformat(),
    'quarto_params': {
        'data_dir': params.get('data_dir', 'not-set'),
        'figures_dir': params.get('figures_dir', 'not-set')
    }
}

# Save provenance
Path('build_metadata.json').write_text(json.dumps(build_meta, indent=2))

# Define paths from params (relative to this file)
